  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
runtime: shiny
---


```{r}

# Show information on DMP status.

# Add action button and style it. 

actionButton(inputId = "info_status", 
             label = "",
             class = "btn-xs",
             icon = icon("info-circle", verify_fa = FALSE),
             style = "background-color: #337ab7; 
                      border: 2px solid #8CBBD2; 
                      border-radius: 5px;")


# Show information about the DMP statuses

observeEvent(input$info_status, {
  
  showModal(
    modalDialog(title = "Information on DMP Statuses",
                easyClose = TRUE,
                footer = NULL,
                tags$div(
                         tags$p(strong("DMP statuses: "),
                                "DMP statuses are defined by considering the project's 
                                start and end dates, the most recent modifications made 
                                by the owner/user, and whether the user remains affiliated 
                                with the institute."),
                          tags$ul(
                                  tags$li(strong("Active: "), 
                                          "The project is currently ongoing and has been 
                                          updated recently."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Completed: "),
                                          "The project is finished, and the DMP was updated 
                                          within six months of completion."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Test: "), 
                                          "The DMP is flagged as a test or resembles a test 
                                          scenario."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Missing Metadata: "), 
                                          "Important data like project dates are missing."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Not Updated: "), 
                                          "The DMP has not received any updates in over a 
                                          year."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Expired: "), 
                                          "The DMP wasn't updated within six months after 
                                          the project finished."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Orphan: "), 
                                          "The project is ongoing, but the owner is no longer
                                          an employee."),
                                  tags$li(strong("Defunct: "), 
                                          "The project is inactive and not managed by the 
                                          original owner.")
                                  )
                         )
                )
          )
})

```
